name: elFinder 2.0 for python
short_description:
This project is started in August, 2013 and aims at translating Studio-42 elFinder 2.0
https://github.com/Studio-42/elFinder
from php to python. It

(1) is supposed to work with python version 2.7 so far
(2) will also be customized to be used as a web2py plugin
(3) will follow the original php code as closely as possible even if something may look "not pythonic" enough. The reason is to make it easy to follow the structure and logic of the original php code, and to fix bugs and provide maintenance changes synchronously with the original Studio-42 code
 (4) will currently NOT include any additional functionalities beside the original Studio-42 code.
 (5) Please feel free to contact me if you are interested in taking part in the translation process or if in future you would like to adapt the code to python web frameworks other then web2py.

Thanks
